issue.title: [CF 1198] Multiwindowing.
issue.body:
Hi Cyberolas. Didn't you consider about that? Like "Shift+rclick to open in new window". Would have been quite convenient.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ckotuna | Imported from CurseForge issue #1198 | Raw

comments.body:
This is not likely to ever happen. I would have to totally re engineer the icon editor for this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
